name: Seven Nights At Rikey's
description:
Welcome to Rikey's! - A FNAF fangame that will challenge you to survive your new night shift in a hautend pizzeria when there are malfunctioning and dangerous animatronic robots trying to locate and kill you.

Good luck!

Game features:

12 characters
7 regular nights
1 Bonus night
Custom night
7 pre-set challenges
Cheats and game modifiers
Lots of secrets and easter eggs
Lots of 'jumpscares'

This game was made in solo development but Matt Warkoski provided most of the drawn characters because he's really talented. Thanks, Matt!

Have fun!
- Elairyx

#fnaf

Play the game right here online:
https://liluo.io/games/eb407881-6391-4c4c-8c7e-1c722da03948

Game development started: August 18, 2020
Game release date: January 31, 2021
